DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Exploring and manipulating the mapping

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Returns the value of the element of the local content specified by name. If no argument is provided the whole local content is returned.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Reads the content value from the form field with name name. If name is not provided, it reads the values of the whole form into the local content.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Delete the content element with the given name (the field name used for setting up the mapping) when saving changes.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Delete the parent content element of the element with the given name (the field name used for setting up the mapping). This can be useful if a whole optional nested content should be removed if (some of) its values are not set.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Checks if all content elements assigned to the form fields listed as arguments have a non-empty value.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Checks if all content elements assigned to the listed form fields are empty.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Checks if at least one of the content elements assigned to the listed form fields is non-empty.
